attributes.action: Send the Army in to stop the riots!
attributes.additional_details:
Get the army in to stop the criminal activity taking place on our streets.

Riots are getting bigger each day, the police are being over-run, this will not undermine the police, just assist them, PEOPLE WILL STOP the minute there is an Army presence because they know the Army mean business

There is a lack of respect for Police and these riots are showing that, give our Police some help!!!
